The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 20 December is 1,743,893 (3,098.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 15 December, there were 147,607 new confirmed cases (262.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 08 December, there were 93,931 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 57% (53,676 extra cases).
